attributes.action: stop unfair charges on 4 x4 vehicles needed in the countryside for work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Peolple who live in the country need these vehicles to get to work especially in poor wether conditions - snow, floods etc. It is unfair to penalise us for using them - why not penalise the manufacturers for not making the 'greener'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
